website_summaries.verdict: Tri-ply construction and brushed steel appearance puts this Calphalon collection against heavy hitters like All-Clad. If you are comfortable with stainless steel cooking methods, this set is an affordable alternative to higher end collections.
pros: Brushed steel, can be taken from oven to table
Thick walls, induction-safe base, and tempered glass lids
cons: Handles on pans can feel too thin in hand
Learning curve for cooking with stainless steel
Warping under high heat is an issue

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best gift I’ve ever given myself
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best gift I’ve ever given myself. You must understand how to use stainless cookware. Any review I’ve read about sticking, burning, and warping, I assume user error in most cases. These have amazing heat distribution My cook times are less and I typically lower the suggested temp 1/2 a temp since they heat so well. Clean up is easy if you follow suggested cleaning tips. Soak with warm soapy water then clean with a soft sponge. I use Astonish cleaner to shine them like new. I truly can’t say enough amazing things about this set. But it should only be purchased by people who understand how to use or are willing to learn how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Booth

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised; not worth the money. Returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is nothing like advertised. They look very nice when brand new (only good quality). Otherwise our issues are these: everything sticks to these pans, and I mean everything including bacon, real butter, fake butter, and grilled cheese. They overheat to the point of melting plastic cooking utensils. They are impossible to clean without scraping, which makes the sticking worse. Handwashed or dishwasher they appear stained after just one use. We are returning these because we simply cannot use them. We have owned other Calphalon products in the past but these are very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Interiors stain almost right away, even after seasoned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a cook, so don't notice the cooking performance. Seems fine. I was hesitant to get a non-stick set, but they actually clean up just fine and maybe better than non-stick in some ways. But even though I seasoned the set, they stain on the interiors in milky blotches. My husband drinks ice tea by the gallons so I make a big batch of it daily using the larger pot, which has stained the interior even though I clean daily. I wished I would have gotten a set of the Red Copper. I LOVE the one pan I have of it. This Calphalon is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pots
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace a set of anodized aluminum Calphalon that were 20+ years old. They had held up well but the black coating had worn off and we were wondering about the possible ill effects of aluminum in our food. So we bought this set of stainless steel pots -- they are lighter than the old ones, and work just as well. Calphalon is a reliable brand that makes first-rate products; I'll be happy to replace these with more Calphalon pots, 20+ years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: I researched many brands before deciding on Calphalon stainless steel. I replaced/ added to an over 20 year old analon set. Heat distribution is even and fast. Took a bit of trial and error getting the right heat setting, lower than I thought to get the perfect temperature. Cleans up well. I use bartenders keep cleaner to keep it looking like New!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Matassa

customer_reviews.title: Great balance of heat distribution and weight
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. Incredible heat distribution, heavy enough they won't warp, and light enough you won't get sprain your wrist (unlike cast iron). If you use them properly (lots of great resources for stainless steel care online), they work beautifully. Somewhat difficult to use stainless on an electric stove because, while the pan responds quickly to heat changes, the stove can't change temperature quickly. Hopefully my next stove will be gas or induction, and then they can really shine.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Gold

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set Exceeding My Basic Needs
customer_reviews.text: This pot set is great; I spun myself up on the proper use of stainless steel cookware, in addition to how to properly season pans. I have yet to have anything stick to my pans. Great value for the money. Heat distribution seems to be even, but I am not much into culinary arts to delve into water boiling times, and even heat dispersion. For the regular kitchen dad these exceed my basic requirements. They look really good, the handles of the pans are of a hollow construction which allow them to be handled while the pan is hot without a need for pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Berberena

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher-safe.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought stainless steel pots so that I could clean them in the dishwasher. But after only three washes, I noticed that the rivets holding the handles onto the lids were discoloured: they're made of aluminum! So while I can put the pots themselves in the dishwasher, I need to hand-wash the lids. The lid handles are also too thermally connected to the rest of the lids. While I can handle the lids of my cheap pots with my bare hands, these lid handles quickly get too hot to touch; I need to use oven mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Unperson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cookware, do not use high heat and make ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cookware, do not use high heat and make sure you understand how to cook with fully clad stainless. They do get brown area after use so be sure to buy bar keepers friend. I do not put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cookware set is great!! The bottoms are perfectly flat
customer_reviews.text: My old wonky-bottom pans wouldn't work on my new glass top stove. This cookware set is great!! The bottoms are perfectly flat, so they make great contact with the stovetop. The handles are long and comfortable, but you do need to use hotpads both on the pot handles and the lid if you've been simmering something for awhile. They get pretty hot. These pans are pretty and functional - love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: If you are serious about cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set and the price. Heat distribution is excellent, so be careful if you are not use to tri-ply things get hot quickly. These do require a little extra elbow grease to keep sparkling but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: This cookware seems to stain very easily, maybe this is to be expected
customer_reviews.text: This cookware seems to stain very easily, maybe this is to be expected, I don't know. I use Bartenders Friend to remove the stains and always wash all of the pieces by hand. The lids make a popping sound as they are cooling down and this concerned me some. I contacted Calphalon and was told to just monitor the situation. My daughter has a similar product and I have not seen this issue with hers.
customer_reviews.author: marge herring

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my Tri-Ply
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a learning curve learning how to cook with stainless steel. Once you've mastered it, this is a great set. Good and solid, great heat distibution on the stove top, then stove top to oven with no worries. I Love this set. Honestly, it's not a non stick surface you are cooking on, but take the correct steps and cooking with it is a breeze. When you are done cooking the cleanup is a little more work than nonstick, but still pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the feel of this set
customer_reviews.text: Have had this set for about a month. Really like the feel of this set. Have not had any problems with foods sticking. I have made sure to use butter or oil and preheat the pans and to not cook above a medium heat. 6/9/2017 I wanted to give a follow up to my previous review now that we have been using this set for almost 6 months. We are still loving this set and have had no problems with food sticking and clean up has been a breeze! We use this set daily often 2-3 times a day and the set still looks as good as the day they came out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda H

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These pans are awesome on our induction oven. They heat VERY quickly and evenly. The only complaint we have is that food seems to stick no matter what the oil preparation is and they have stained very quickly. It's ok - they are going to get beat up over time but the "stainless" is not so stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie L

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these less then 2 months. The lids get what trapped in the seal in between the glass and the stainless part. The bottom has a film on it, I’m not sure if that’s how they all are. And where the rivets/screw things are it has started to rust already. I am very unhappy with this product considering how expensive they were.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst investment I’ve ever made in cookware. The pots don’t clean well and the very worst thing is the weight balance. You can’t pick up these pans and keep from spilling everything all over the place ! The handles are so thin and unbalanced compared to the weight of the pans that it’s laughable! I’m getting rid of them and getting another set elsewhere! I’m serious.... they suck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pots are great...Pans not sooo much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago. The pots are still doing great but, every Pan in this mix has a warped bottom and does not sit level on the stove. Very disappointed in the pans. If I try and cook eggs I have to try and prop the handle to keep the eggs from running to one side. I always cooked on medium too. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lawrence Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sent this back already once for warping (yes. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent this back already once for warping (yes. We followed every single instruction) and still have warping. Ridiculous. I wouldn't buy these again. I would not have such a problem if we had gas stove, but we have electric.
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: I love to cook
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook. This is just my personal opinion but really tried, especially considering cost but just couldn't keep food from sticking no matter what I did. Life's to short for this much cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: james windover

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Entry level chef status. My partners loves the quality and looks of this set. I enjoy how much of a difference the cooking is vice cheaper teflon coated versions, but to each their own. Heat distribution on an electric stove is better improved, haven't tried it on a gas stove so can't validate its performance under that venue. In the end it was a perfect price compared to Kohl's or any major outlet that carried it.
customer_reviews.author: Vik H

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, even heat all over
customer_reviews.text: We finally got rid of our very old Calphalon non-stick cookware and went with stainless. It is surprisingly light, handles do not heat up and the heat distribution and stability is great! You do have to pay attention to getting the temp right and oil before searing, etc. to prevent sticking, but that's with all stainless. Evenness of heat is remarkable and heat up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: great pans
customer_reviews.text: I was used to using nonstick pans so I was worried these would be tough to keep clean. They wash up great. I love the variety of sizes in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: We used this skillet for 5 months and the non stick coating started coming out. To clarify - 1. We used it only to fry eggs 2. We never scrubbed it with metal 3. We never used metal or hard spoons on the skillet 4. We never even washed it in a dishwasher Such a sad experience with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, and quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these pots/pans for about a month. I love the weight and quality of them. This was a great bargain for 13 pieces for the price. Lots of sizes and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: John Carter

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: When you wash and need to dry right away to keep clean to prevent spot on any place pot. Overall new cookwares are great and taste better than old cookwares. Only difficulty was cooking eggs or scrabble eggs which need to stay with it to keep it up to prevent burn or stick. So far, I have been doing good lately and taste great than old cookwares.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing pots that heat fast and clean easy! Be sure to use the proper cleaning tools.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I love Calphalon products, and these were no exception. One of the small sauce pans appears to have a slight ding on it though. I don’t think this will affect use of the pan, but it is a visual flaw.
customer_reviews.author: R. Surber

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is great cookware. VERY durable. We have had a set for over 10 years and it is like new. We bought this set for our son moving into to his first place. It heats VERY evenly and is easy to keep looking nice if you treat it right it will last a lifetime. Never run cold water into a hot pan and clean with Bar Keepers Friend.
customer_reviews.author: D. FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality stainless set. The only thing I don't like are the handles. They don't seem solid in the hand. A little out of balance. I think the handles should be a bit wider for a sturdier feel.
customer_reviews.author: L1219

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they replaced ceramic nonstick pans I had previously. They were easy to transition to from nonstick. The only thing I notice is that these pans take longer to heat up than my previous ones. But they are gorgeous and clean up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks
customer_reviews.text: These pans are terrible. Huge waste of money. Everything sticks and very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Expensive pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great except everything and I mean everything sticks to them. There should be an easier way to season them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gresser

customer_reviews.title: Foods Stick to Cooking Surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Cooking surfaces are not non-sticking. Eggs frying in the pan will stick to the surface and the yokes break trying to get them out of the pan. I've tried using Pam and they still stick. I've actually gone back to my old pans. Also, the stainless steel pan perimeter discolors with each use and cannot be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of pots and pans, much better than the Viking I originally bought for much more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this set and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: We thought we were getting a reasonably priced, but quality cookware set. To cut to the chase, we got what we expected. We love this set and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: North Texas Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Pans
customer_reviews.text: My second set of Calphalon pans....but my first set of Tri Ply stainless ones. These by far exceed my expectations. I do not care much for my first set!...food sticks to them and they are supposed to be non stick! Plus....the bottoms of them warped.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: A Great Set of cookware
customer_reviews.text: My mom gave me this set of cookware for my birthday to replace some awful non-stick set that was scratched and creating a residue of stuff I did not want in my stomach. On first use, I love the set. It is heavy duty and beautiful. But when I cook pasta, the pasta stuck a bit. My mom told me to put a little oil in the boiling water. If that is the solution, I will truly love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette R. Liska

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy cooking with this set. Durable and great looking cookware that will last many years. I suggest getting some stainless cleaner to keep them new looking.
customer_reviews.author: AMoose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, high maintenance, useless customer service, challenging webiste
customer_reviews.text: The cookware is lovely but takes awhile to figure out how to,use properly. Don't even think about calling customer service. They don't answer or are in staff meetings. I was on hold for 30 minutes multiple times. Everything is done on line although it's not a user friendly site especially if you gave older equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice pots and pans. Getting used to cooking with stainless may take a while, but I like the feel and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Blank

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cookware!
customer_reviews.text: As always with stainless steel, I find you have to soak the frying pans after frying bacon, potatoes, etc...making eggs in them, is fine at a lower heat and lots of butter!! All other pieces are great to cook in.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Krohn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra dough
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to save money on cookware in the past, but it always turned out to be a bad investment. So I stepped up to the Calphalon and got my monies worth, and then some This set has all the pieces we could ever need, the quality and performance are outstanding, and cleaning is good as long as you follow the consensus of good cooking preparation, and cleaning tips out there.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Buy Bar Keepers Friend too!!
customer_reviews.text: I also bought the Bar Keepers Friend to clean them which works great..so would definitely recommend you do too. I love stainless and Calphalon is a great brand for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the quality of this set
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of this set. I purchased this set years ago and couldn't believe the difference in the weight. Will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lakefan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I mean, how can you go wrong with these pans. Great assortment of sizes, they heat up SUPER fast. Depending on what you cook they can be hard to clean, but I think that pretty much goes with any pan. The handles to not heat up so no worries about burning yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set and much cheaper than available locally
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and work as advertised. Very nice set and much cheaper than available locally.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This cookware has been great! Cooks food evenly and looks good doing it
customer_reviews.text: This cookware has been great! Cooks food evenly and looks good doing it. Some reviewers have mentioned that the handles get hot... We haven't run into this problem at all, the handles stay nice and cool even when boiling water at higher heat settings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy made in China. False advertising
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT made in AMERICA. These are made in China! Says it right in t he box.... so disappointed! Patent in America but now made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love the set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they have the glass lids which my wife and I love. We had read other reviews which rated these pans as very good and so far the pans have been excellent. We have two Calphalon non-stick pans, one for searing and one for eggs and such. Perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: San Martin

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, easy to care for.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans, so many different sizes for every dish. Non-stick and so easy to clean, always look brad new.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Vargas

customer_reviews.title: We like the Tri-ply Stainless
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, but not too heavy.There's good even distribution of heat.We like the clear lids and cool handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These were everything they were described to be. So far, I've cooked 3 omelets with butter and there was minimal sticking and I cleaned them up easily but I didn't let it sit very long. My wife cooked popcorn in the dutch oven today and didn't burn a single piece. This set is very heavy duty and feels like they will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Big BT

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money. After receiving the pots and pans as a gift a bonus set came. Without the bonus set the pots and pans are all they are advertised, easy to clean, holds the temperature and look great. They are now hanging in our kitchen ready to use on every occassion.
customer_reviews.author: scarrol

customer_reviews.title: Will last generations
customer_reviews.text: I've had many Stainless cookware sets. These are the best I've ever had. Even cooking - good heft & comfortable handles. They are a solid value & I'm confident they will not only last a lifetime, but likely generations.
customer_reviews.author: Macman

customer_reviews.title: Pans are ok but hard to keep silver
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money on All-Clad. I have these and All-Clad pans. Takes a LOT more effort to keep these silver. Cooking performance is ok not as good as All-Clad either, food sticks more readily to these.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks after multiple different tries a various combinations on heat, oil type and quantity of oil. Bottoms of my pans are not flat/ warped and do not work well on a smooth top/ glass stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: great for induction stoves
customer_reviews.text: Calphon exceeded all my expectations for usage on an induction stove. No noises and the cookware heats almost instantly. My goal was to purchase a cookware set for my new induction stove. Prior to installing the induction stove tried on regular electric stove. Cookware heated up faster than my regular pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: ELH INC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, nice, heavy, very well built, if you take care of this cookware set last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Julian Bejarano

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pans you will love.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! I never burn anything in these! They are a heavy weight and look so nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: 123Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks to them
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans look nice but everything sticks to them. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krystal R.

customer_reviews.title: davenbill
customer_reviews.text: Read the good and bad reviews and felt the good outweighed the bad. We cook on a gas range and have lowered the heat(low to med, not high) as recommended. Any stuck on food comes off with a 10 min soak in the sink and a sponge. Barkeepers Friend removes any discolorations. Love this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: davenbill

customer_reviews.title: Packed extremely well...
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon exceptionally good cookware...cooks well, cleans well, easy to purchase from Amazon...very satisfied with Amazon's delivery and the Calphalon product!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA R DEVERNA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware for money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookware set for the money. Nice hefty feel to pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Rbrtstntn77

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This set was bought as a gift for my son. I have owned my own calphalon set for years and have been completely satisfied with the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood l Boehler

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set of stainless steel cookware that should last you long time. Temperature is even across the cooking surface, they look great and feel great. Take care of them and they will feed you for years.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: What kind of quality that make food stick even in low heat?broke my heart.
customer_reviews.text: They are all small.food stick even before food is ready in low heat
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased these. Great quality, I feel like a master chef when using these.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want half your meal stuck to the pan
customer_reviews.text: good looking and high quality set, but they are not practical for cooking because they are extremely heavy and not non-stick at all. Things get so badly stuck the moment they touch the pan it’s impossible to fry anything
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon pans
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her husband are thrilled with the pans. They both like to cook and were impressed with my set, so we gave these as a Christmas gift and they love them. Food cooks evenly on them and they are easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Criste

customer_reviews.title: My best cookware set to date!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Food seems to taste better and cook more thoroughly. They say you get what you pay for, and they weren't lying.
customer_reviews.author: DIVINESENT

customer_reviews.title: Some Issues
customer_reviews.text: These pans are high quality, but some had warped bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cookware. I have used it a lot and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of cookware. My daughter and I have a set and I bought one for my son as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marilla Reese

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have followed the directions for use and my pans are coming out just like new. I have only had them about a month, but I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cross

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: I had really done a lot of investigating before purchasing these pans. The chef in the family told me to buy All Clad but I had a hard time paying that much money. This set is perfect! I love everything about these pans and the all of the different sizes. Definitely get the barkeep! It keeps them looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: C. K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it. Very well made and works great.
customer_reviews.author: A@~1011AA🏤q aAmazon Custqqqomeraqq AQQQQW31\Zqqaaql=£Qq~℅¿a?I £@=@@WaA Aw11qQaQQQ1?oq @aqqqAUQ QAAq

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: What a great set of pans, would be perfect for a gift, but I purchased for myself. Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've had this set for about a month now and no sign of wear/tear. A little bit of discoloration on the bottom of the 12" pan at first, but nothing elbow-grease and Bartenders Helper couldn't get out. Good weight and feel to each also. I only gave it 4 stars because I had to buy the 12" lid separately.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: 100% safe
customer_reviews.text: Like: absolutely everything bout the product. Dislike: Now I want to cook more so I had to give up one of my naps.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Beck

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: The lids are light and lower in quality, though the construction of the pots and pans are of good quality. I have other Calphalon stainless tri-ply pots and pans purchased separately that are of higher quality. Those have lids that are heavy glass and fits perfectly where these sets have lids that does not fit well and has a lot of play and are lighter. Otherwise this set is decent and are functional.
customer_reviews.author: samrang hai

customer_reviews.title: Great for home cooks
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots and pans. Great heat distribution and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are really happy with these pots and pans. They clean up nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pans look and feel nice, however
customer_reviews.text: The pans look and feel nice, however, no matter how hard we try, foods stick to the skillets. Cleaning them is difficult and more food sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware!! If you know how to properly cook on stainless steal, you will have zero issues! Best cookware I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: JessieS

customer_reviews.title: Even heating
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the pans clean up after cooking. They are not my grandmothers pots and pans!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Huey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cookware! Conducts heat beautifully with no sticking
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cookware! Conducts heat beautifully with no sticking. Easy to clean and lovely to look at. Couldn't be more pleased!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda McStay

customer_reviews.title: I seasoned the pans and was satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! All the pots and pans are lite weight and because of that they don't retain heat. I seasoned the pans and was satisfied with the results. I used the large fry pan tonight, cooked up some sausage and cabbage. I could not get a good fry on the sausage or the cabbage. I ended up pulling out my cast iron to finish the deal. I do not recommend the set for a serious cook. They look cheap, IMHO and don't preform. I'll keep using my 20 year old non-stick Calphalon and cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggggg
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeer my pots. Heats up quickly, easy to clean heavy food quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son and his girlfriend couldn't say enough good things about this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking. Have to use some elbow grease to get it clean though. My high end dishwasher just doesn't quite get it clean even on the pots and pans cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Hyper

customer_reviews.title: I love the stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I love the stainless steel. I previously owned non stick. I did order non stick omelet skillet for more delicate foods. I would have paid more attention to the pans that came with this set. I may have ordered individual pans or a set with less skillets since I ordered the other skillets. I do like the Calphalon quality. On the Calphalon website they offer videos of proper care for your stainless steel that I found helpful. Also pay attention to your quart sizes if you are looking for a large spaghetti pot order it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research for both quality and price, I settled on this set of pans. They are great, cook really well, and clean up like a dream!!
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans. Never washed them in the dishwasher. Nice and heavy-duty! Only wish they created a 1 quart sauce pan WITH LID!!! Calphalon please read that part again. Instead, if you want a lid, you have to buy another brand. Outside of that these pans heat very quickly, fire them on low and let them go. I don't use anything higher than 3 unless I am boiling water. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They have a great weight to them and so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought it should've been better quality
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with this purchase, things stick to the bottom of pots & skillets even when cooking with low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality pots and pans. Great set and fairl price.
customer_reviews.author: P. C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great cookware!
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of learning how to cook with them but now I just love these pots and pans! The cook my food uniformly and at very low temps.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cookware. Food does stick but after soaking pan, it cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

product_meta.title: Calphalon Tri-Ply Stainless Steel 13-Piece Cookware Set
product_meta.description: Size:13-Piece| Color:Stainless SteelClassically styled with a polished stainless steel exterior and a satin finished interior, the Calphalon Tri-Ply Stainless Steel 13-pc. Cookware Set features pots and pans designed with three layers to ensure even, consistent heating. A heavy-gauge aluminum core surrounded by stainless steel provides excellent heat conduction for browning and searing, while giving you enhanced control of the cooking process.
feature_bullets: Aluminum core between 2 stainless steel layers provides even heating for excellent browning and control of the cooking process. Non porous stainless steel cooking surface is safe for use with all utensils

Elegant brushed stainless steel exterior on pots and pans can go from the oven or stove directly to the table. Reflective cook surface makes it easy to monitor foods as they cook and remains beautiful over time
Clear tempered glass lids let you see food while it's cooking and are oven safe, so you can finish covered dishes in the oven or keep them warm until ready to serve
Long, brushed stainless steel handles stay cool on the stovetop. All cookware is dishwasher safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty
Includes 8 , 10 , and 12 inch omelette pans, 1 1/2 and 2 1/2 quart sauce pans with lids, 3 quart chef's pan with lid, 3 quart saute pan with lid, and 6 quart stock pot with lid

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars482 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
